rules_text:
Flying
When Bloodline Caller enters the battlefield, if you control at least two other Vampires, transform Bloodline Caller.
flavor_text: [i]One day all of mankind will be vampires. On that day the world will end. We will feast on the humans who are now our own kin.............[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player lost no life last turn, transform Vampire Soulstealer.
flavor_text2:
[i]Killing the others in moderation now will prevent an epidemic in the future.
— Sorin Markov[/i]
